title: Step 60

challengeFiles.name: index
challengeFiles.contents: CSS Color Markers
challengeFiles.seed: CSS Color Markers

challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your .green CSS rule should have a background property with the value #007F00.

description:
The red marker is looking much more realistic. Now you'll do the same for the green marker, using a combination of the linear-gradient function and hex colors.

In the .green CSS rule, change the background-color property to background.
